game.name: Space Tales
game.shortDescription: Space Tales is an epic space opera that delivers the tactical complexity of classic RTS gameplay within a universe where ancient horrors lurk beyond the stars. Follow Xander's journey from a loyal Inter-Planetary Expansion (IPE) soldier to a champion who uncovers the darkest secrets of the cosmos.
